QuestData.Title: For Kul Tiras!
QuestData.Description:
Listen, I'll be frank with you; we're not at full strength here. Many of our soldiers recently left for Boralus on new orders.
It's like they knew just when to hit us...
But we're going to hit back! Every able-bodied man and woman in town has stepped up to mount a defense.
Take this battle standard and remind them what they're fighting for!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Proudmoore Battle Standard to inspire $1oa Vigil Hill Marines or Militia.
QuestData.CompletionText: They say a warrior fights twice as hard when he thinks of home.
QuestData.RewardText: It fills my heart with pride to hear that battlecry ring out across the field.
